text.p: Yugoslavia beat Slovakia 2-0 in their World Cup European group six qualifier on Sunday.

Yugoslavia - 1-Ivica Kralj, 2-Zoran Mirkovic 3-Goran Djorovic, 4-Slavisa Jokanovic, 5-Miroslav Djukic, 6-Sinisa Mihajlovic, 7-Vladimir Jugovic, 8-Dejan Savicevic (14-Dejan Govedarica 88), 9-Predrag Mijatovic, 10-Dragan Stojkovic, 11-Albert Nadj, (15-Ljubinko Drulovic 73).

Slovakia - 1-Vladislav Molnar, 2-Marian Zeman, 3-Miroslav Karhan, 4-Robert Tomaschek (Julius Simon 45), 5-Vladimir Kinder, 6-Dusan Tittel, 7-Igor Balis, 8-Marek Spilar, 9-Tibor Jancula (19-Jozef Kozlej 80), 10-Jozef Majoros (16-Sailard Nemet 66), 11-Lubomir Moravcik.
